text: Hari Chand (1 April 1953 â€“ 13 June 2022) was an Indian long-distance runner. He competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, where he came eighth.Surendra betters record - The Hindu In the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow he came 10th in the 10,000 meter run. He ran barefoot in Montreal. Chand died on 13 June 2022 in Hoshiarpur, India from a long illness, aged 69.Hari Chand, India's Long-Distance Running Legend, Dies Aged 69 ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indian athletes Category:Long-distance runners Category:Olympians for India
title: Hari Chand
